text: The Powerlifting at the 1987 Southeast Asian Games was held between 17 September to 18 September at Senayan Sports Complex. ==Medal summary== ===Men=== {| |- |52 kg | Lili Entong Nurhayadi | Gregorio Colonia | Augustine Covelin |- |56 kg | Samuel Alegada | Dirdja Wihardja | Pun Pai Boon Wanchai |- |90 kg | Ramon Solis | Mohammad Yasin |- |100 kg | Thet Kyaw | Luis Bayanin | Shamchai Boonlue |- |110 kg | Gunadi Usman | Myint San | Udom Yostoh |} ==Medal table== ==References== * http://eresources.nlb.gov.sg/newspapers/Digitised/Article/straitstimes19870918-1.2.48.21.7 * http://eresources.nlb.gov.sg/newspapers/Digitised/Article/straitstimes19870919-1.2.56.21 Category:1987 Southeast Asian Games Category:Weightlifting at the Southeast Asian Games
title: Weightlifting at the 1987 Southeast Asian Games
